sect2.title: Installation of PostgreSQL
sect2.para: Install PostgreSQL with the following commands:
Initialize a database cluster with the following commands:

userinput.command: mkdir -p /var/pgsql/data && useradd -d /var/pgsql/data postgres && chown postgres /var/pgsql/data && su - postgres -c '/usr/bin/initdb -D /var/pgsql/data'
